description: A great vegetarian fried rice dish packed with vegetables and a soft and smoky tofu.
name: Szechuan Fried Rice with Tofu & Peppers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g tofu, drained and cut into bite size cubes
1 medium green capsicum, peeled and chopped
1 medium red capsicum, peeled and chopped
1 medium yellow capsicum, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Fry the tofu pieces for 10 minutes with the soy sauce while turning and remove from the pan once they start to brown.
Add the peppers and garlic to the pan and fry everything while tossing for 6 minutes.
Cook the rice as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Add the beaten eggs to the pan with the veg and cook while constantly breaking up for 5 minutes.
Add the tofu, rice, vinegar and Szechuan sauce to the pan and cook while tossing for 10 minutes.
Remove the fried rice from the heat and serve with scallions to garnish.
